item.title: Within the last 24 hours, the entire network has seen a total of $587 million in liquidations, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On August 18th, based on Coinglass data, the total value that was liquidated across the entire network within the past 24 hours reached $587 million. A total of 133,228 individuals were liquidated globally. The amount of long liquidations was $504 million, and the amount of short liquidations was $82.32 million.

item.title: US Stock Ethereum Strategy Stocks saw mixed results, with BTCS rising by 7.48% and BMNR falling by 3.82%.
item.description: On August 18th, based on market data, US stock Ethereum strategy stocks showed mixed performances during the trading session. These include:- Bitmine (BMNR), down 3.82%.- BTCS (BTCS), up 7.48%.- SharpLink Gaming (SBET), up 4.08%.- GameSquare (GAME), up 3.64%.- ETHZilla (ETHZ), down 5.04%.- Bit Digital (BTBT), down 1.16%.

item.title: Coinbase Launches SOL and XRP Perpetual Contracts
item.description: On August 18th, Coinbase Futures officially announced on social media that U.S. traders are now able to access SOL and XRP perpetual futures contracts on the Coinbase exchange and obtain 5x leverage in a secure and regulated environment.

item.title: A whale address bought 3.59 million AERO tokens, with an average price of $1.40 each.
item.description: On August 18th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale address spent 5.05 million USDC 14 hours ago and purchased 3.59 million AERO at an average price of $1.4.

item.title: Injective is launching an on-chain NVIDIA H100 GPU rental fee market
item.description: On August 18th, according to official channels, Injective has entered into a partnership with the hashing power marketplace development company Squaretower to launch the world's first on-chain NVIDIA H100 GPU hourly rental rate trading market. By leveraging Squaretower's custom oracle, this market updates the hourly H100 rental prices provided by top hash power suppliers. This revolutionary innovation converts the real-time rental price of a crucial component of AI infrastructure - NVIDIA's flagship H100 GPU - into a tradable on-chain asset, thereby opening up a new realm for decentralized finance.

item.title: Tom Lee: Historic Opportunity Unfolding in the Ethereum Ecosystem, Poised to Witness Unprecedented Wave of Innovation
item.description: On August 18th, Tom Lee, the newly appointed Chairman of the Board of BitMine, stated in a post on Design Media that when the United States abandoned the gold standard in 1971, many people focused on gold. However, the real winner was Wall Street. With the vigorous development of the trading system and financial infrastructure, the modern financial landscape was established.Today, with the progress of the White House's "GENIUS Act" and the SEC's "Project Crypto", a similar historical opportunity is emerging within the Ethereum ecosystem. When this digital financial infrastructure is in place, we will witness an unprecedented wave of innovation.

item.title: A whale address added 111,000 LINK to its position 3 hours ago, bringing the total holdings to 1,040,000 LINK.
item.description: On August 18th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the address 0x4EB...3d5aF is said to have reaccumulated 111,310 LINK tokens 3 hours ago, with a value of $2.76 million.Currently, this address holds a total of 1.044 million LINK tokens (approximately $24.64 million), and the average entry price is $23.6, resulting in an unrealized profit of $1.093 million.

item.title: Sky Protocol spent $1.39 million last week to buy back 17.32 million SKY tokens
item.description: August 18th. The team of The Sky Protocol (formerly known as MakerDAO) officially announced on social media that the protocol spent $1.39 million during the previous week to repurchase 17.32 million SKY tokens.

item.title: 「BNB Version of MicroStrategy」 BNC Plunges 17.42% Intraday
item.description: On August 18th, based on market data, the "BNB Version Microstrategy" in the US stock market, BNB Network Company (BNC), witnessed an intraday decline of 17.42% and is currently trading at $20.53.Previously, before the opening of the US stock market today, BNB Network Company announced that its total holding of BNB has increased to 325,000 coins, with an addition of 125,000 coins to the initial 200,000 coins acquired. With the impetus of this positive news, BNC surged 9.98% at the opening of the US stock market today.

item.title: 「$125,000 ETH Long Liquidation」 Whale Long Position Faces Approximately $580,000 Unrealized Loss
item.description: On August 18th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), as ETH once again dropped below $4300, the two addresses of the "125K USD Liquidation Long ETH" whale are both in an unrealized loss state, with a total unrealized loss of approximately $580,000. The details are as follows:Address 0xd076...27bb: It holds 23,011 ETH, with an entry price of $4,314.1 and a liquidation price of $4,172.4.Address 0x5f72...da67: It holds 8,752.94 ETH, with an entry price of $4,324.68 and a liquidation price of $4,207.65.
